name: Osaka 18th International Conference on “ Business, Economics, Social Science & Humanities- BESSH-2017”
content: “Advances in collaborative research for Business, Economics, Social Sciences and Humanities” The conference will cover vital issues in Business, Economics, Social Sciences and Humanities under multiple sub-themes. The aim of our conference is to support, encourage and provide a platform for networking, sharing, publishing and nurturing the potential growth of individual scholars across the globe. CONFERENCE DATE: July 27-28, 2017 CONFERENCE VENUE:Osaka International Convention Center 5 Chome-3-3-51 Nakanoshima, Kita Ward, Osaka, Osaka Prefecture 530-0005 Submission Email: oks577@academicfora.com ISBN: 978-969-683-633-9 IMPORTANT DATES: Abstract Submission Date: June 12, 2017 Notification of Acceptance / Rejection: With in one week of submission time Full Paper Submission: July 20, 2017 Early Bird Registration: June 10, 2017
